title: Champions that i will always regret not banning if they're picked

replies.body: Fizz mother fucking Fizz, the champion sucks right now but the only people who play him are literally fizz one tricks, and you all complain about Akali but let me tell you, their is nothing in this world that is more annoying than a really good Fizz one trick.

A good Riven one trick?

Even when Riven is bad, she’s incredibly frustrating to fight.

Riven is overloaded as fuck (Not saying Akali isn't), I can't trade back well at lvl 1 to lvl 6, at all. She has a shield that is the size of burj khalifa, 2 cc abilities that also deal a lot of damage, passive that gives damage every time a single ability is casted and her ult is an execution.

You can't escape her, she can escape you, she can out heal most champions with just Death Dance, she is a monster at 1v1'ing and team fighting because even if you suck at her, land one CC and just spam your keyboard till you do enough damage, and did I mention that she's actually strong as fuck right now?

51% win rate and 12% pick rate (Rounded it).

Riot will never change her because she's popular, Riot doesn't give a shit about small champion communities like Akali and Irelia, unless the rest of community demands changes like how they gutted both of them, and their now shit unless your amazing at them by macro and mechanically.

https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/platinum/plus/champion/Riven/

Not to mention Fizz counters my favorite champions after level 1 and especially after 6.

{{champion:101}} charging Q?  Fizz presses R and gets a free kill.
{{champion:142}} presses R?  Fizz presses R and gets a free kill.
{{champion:99}} Presses Q?  Hop over it and murder her for free.  Also press R during any of her abilities since they all have cast times for a free kill.
{{champion:53}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:26}}, I know Zilean isn't OP or anything but his entire kit is aggravating, and seemingly made to mess with and piss people off.

I love playing Zilean against a Volibear or other nearly immobile champion.  Just perma cc them and they can't do a thing.  I feel a little bad about it after about the 3rd kill where they couldn't do a thing, but it is very satisfying.
It's funner to play Morgana against Immobile melee champions, IMO. It is borderline impossible for champions without a dash to chase someone with a Morgana present.

as long as you dont miss lol. i always get a good laugh seeing people that suck at skill shots trying to play morg. If you cant skill shot just stick to point and click lulllll. her bindings are broken though.
That's the beauty of an immobile melee champion. You always know exactly where they want to run. You can usually just wait until right before they are going to catch their target and root them.
or the classic fake out act like youre going to bind someone then hit a different target all together so they dont try to dodge. get so many kills like that in bot lane.
Lol trust me, Zilean does it better.
I played Morg vs Darius once, took glacial augment for my keystone and rushed twin shadows.  Quite enjoyable imo

It's also quite funny if Nasus slows you and you slow him back, as he can't reach you while both are walking in slow motion
 {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
Actually, Zilean is insanely OP if the game goes on long enough. One of my friends main that champ and lemme tell you... we rarely lose a game past the 25minute mark.
i dont main zilean but he is one of my favorite mid or sup picks. Nothing more satisfying than landing the 3+ man stun in a late game teamfight and then throwing the ult on a fed jax/yi/yas

When you don't ban irelia and the enemy team gets her. You get lulled into a false sense of security when she goes 0/3 in lane, then she proceeds to instagib your carries 5mins later with triforce components...

Yeah, her sick 45 % winrate says enough of how op she's
winrates on there own don't determine if a champion is balanced or not

> [{quoted}](name=Death by Glamour,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4AceJsxF,comment-id=000400000001,timestamp=2019-01-12T00:13:24.021+0000)
>
> winrates on there own don't determine if a champion is balanced or not

Akali is trash tier. Only good for laning phase, maybe.

Unless you belong to the top 2% who are master / challenger high diamond

Winrates can mean many things such as that champ is popular with those who don’t know how to use that champ or is hard to a point where a select few play them who are good so they have deceptively high winrates, my point is NOONE cares about winrates if they have NO application to the situation they face in game.
Actually a winrate below 50% means the champ is broken. Because him being broken make him popular so unskilled persons play him and make his winrate low.

Then one stormy night a dev came to say


Vayne should be doing good despite there being no tanks


Wont you be toxic and blow up the meta tonight


all the enemy players shouted out with rage.


Vayne the red eyed fuck wad, youll take us all down in misery.
Upvoted for the song, but vayne is just another one of those late game scaling adcs that become unstoppable without the last patch. Idk she isnt that terrible to play against just annoying
